trans-unit.source: Supports a simple iteration over a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 간단한 반복을 지원 한 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators provide read-only access to the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션의에서 데이터에 대 한 읽기 전용 액세스를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 내부 컬렉션을 수정 하 여 열거자를 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 처음에 열거자는 컬렉션의 첫 번째 요소 앞에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Reset%2A> method also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Reset%2A>메서드도 실행 하면 열거자가이 위치로 복원 합니다.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Current%2A> property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 이 위치에서, 호출 된 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Current%2A>속성 예외를 throw 합니다.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>열거자 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Current%2A> 의 값을 읽기 전에 컬렉션의 첫 번째 요소로 이동 하는 메서드</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 를 호출 해야 따라서

trans-unit.source: This class inherits from the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스에서 상속 된 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: For more information about enumerating over a collection, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 열거 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 요소를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator> does not move the position of the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator>열거자의 위치를 이동 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator>

trans-unit.source: Consecutive calls to the Current property return the same object until either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Reset%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 현재 속성에 연속 해 서 호출 될 때까지 동일한 개체를 반환 된 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>또는 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Reset%2A>메서드를 호출 합니다.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 요소는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection or after the last element.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션의 또는 마지막 요소 뒤의 첫 번째 요소 앞에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Advances the enumerator to the next element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 열거자의 다음 요소로 이동는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method advances the enumerator to the next element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 컬렉션의 다음 요소에는 열거자를 이동합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about enumerating over a collection, see the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> topic.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 열거 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>항목.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>열거자를 다음 요소로 이동 성공 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 열거자가 컬렉션의 끝을 통과 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션은 열거자를 만든 후 수정 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 요소 앞의 초기 위치에 열거자를 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션이 변경 되지으로 유효한 상태를 유지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> or Reset method throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 변경 되 면, 추가 하는 등 요소, 수정 또는 삭제 열거자는 무효화 하 고 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.MoveNext%2A>재설정 메서드에서 throw <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> 이나</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator.MoveNext%2A> 다음에 호출

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션은 열거자를 만든 후 수정 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버에 대 한 참조 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator>

trans-unit.source: The current element in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 현재 요소는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection or after the last element.
trans-unit.target: 열거자는 컬렉션의 또는 마지막 요소 뒤의 첫 번째 요소 앞에 배치 됩니다.

trans-unit.target: 이 멤버에 대 한 참조 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>열거자를 다음 요소로 이동 성공 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 열거자가 컬렉션의 끝을 통과 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션은 열거자를 만든 후 수정 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버에 대 한 참조 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator>
